**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321004825/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321004825/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : KLIM**

**Kia ora!**  
 [KLIM](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321004825/http:/www.klim.co.nz/) is a typographic design studio run by [Kris Sowersby](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321004825/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Kris%20Sowersby). The KLIM studio has been set up to deal specifically with typographic issues within the realm of graphic design. If you need something that is typographic by nature, then I am at your service.

**A thing well made…**  
…is a song by legendary New Zealand band The Mutton Birds. ‘When a man holds a thing well made, there is a connection, there is completeness…’ This philosophy is at the very heart of my approach to typographic design—for art is long and life is short.
